content:
The Waldorf Astoria Las Vegas offers a range of luxurious rooms and suites, each designed to provide an unforgettable experience. Here's an overview of the different types of rooms and their amenities:

**Deluxe Rooms:**

* **Deluxe Room:** 520 sq. ft., king or queen bed, city or Strip views
	+ Amenities: marble bathroom, separate tub and shower, 49-inch HDTV, Bluetooth speakers, Nespresso machine, and minibar
* **Deluxe Room with Strip View:** 520 sq. ft., king or queen bed, Strip views
	+ Amenities: same as Deluxe Room, with added Strip views

**Suites:**

* **Junior Suite:** 750 sq. ft., king bed, separate living area, city or Strip views
	+ Amenities: marble bathroom, separate tub and shower, 49-inch HDTV, Bluetooth speakers, Nespresso machine, minibar, and added living area with sofa and chairs
* **One-Bedroom Suite:** 1,000 sq. ft., king bed, separate living area, city or Strip views
	+ Amenities: marble bathroom, separate tub and shower, 49-inch HDTV, Bluetooth speakers, Nespresso machine, minibar, and added living area with sofa, chairs, and dining table
* **One-Bedroom Suite with Strip View:** 1,000 sq. ft., king bed, separate living area, Strip views
	+ Amenities: same as One-Bedroom Suite, with added Strip views

**Premier Suites:**

* **Premier One-Bedroom Suite:** 1,200 sq. ft., king bed, separate living area, city or Strip views
	+ Amenities: marble bathroom, separate tub and shower, 49-inch HDTV, Bluetooth speakers, Nespresso machine, minibar, added living area with sofa, chairs, and dining table, and personalized concierge service
* **Premier Two-Bedroom Suite:** 1,800 sq. ft., two king beds, separate living area, city or Strip views
	+ Amenities: two marble bathrooms, separate tub and shower, 49-inch HDTV, Bluetooth speakers, Nespresso machine, minibar, added living area with sofa, chairs, and dining table, and personalized concierge service

**Specialty Suites:**

* **Waldorf Suite:** 2,000 sq. ft., king bed, separate living area, city or Strip views
	+ Amenities: marble bathroom, separate tub and shower, 49-inch HDTV, Bluetooth speakers, Nespresso machine, minibar, added living area with sofa, chairs, and dining table, personalized concierge service, and private access to the Waldorf Astoria Lounge
* **Presidential Suite:** 4,500 sq. ft., king bed, separate living area, city or Strip views
	+ Amenities: marble bathroom, separate tub and shower, 49-inch HDTV, Bluetooth speakers, Nespresso machine, minibar, added living area with sofa, chairs, and dining table, personalized concierge service, private access to the Waldorf Astoria Lounge, and private butler service

All rooms and suites at the Waldorf Astoria Las Vegas feature:

* Plush bedding and linens
* High-tech amenities, including a 49-inch HDTV and Bluetooth speakers
* Marble-clad bathrooms with separate tub and shower
* 24-hour room service and personalized concierge service
* Access to the Waldorf Astoria Spa and fitness center

Keep in mind that room sizes and amenities may vary depending on the specific room type and category. If you have any specific preferences or requirements, I recommend contacting the hotel directly to confirm the details.
